description:
Horror News comes that night in front of Kigata and the teacher. And comes the spirit, too. But the newspaper looks normal to the teacher and he cannot see the spirit even though the spirit gets rough with him. The teacher took Kigata to a medium who has an ability to see and speak to spirits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) This mysterious newspaper is delivered at midnight! Part 3
